name: mssql-dxt
description: A Desktop Extension to interact with Microsoft SQL Server.

server_address.title: Server Address
server_address.description: Hostname or IP address of the MS SQL Server instance.

port.title: Port
port.description: Port number for the MS SQL Server instance.

database_name.title: Database Name
database_name.description: The default database to connect to.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username for SQL Server Authentication. (Leave blank for Windows Auth)

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for SQL Server Authentication. (Leave blank for Windows Auth)

driver.title: ODBC Driver
driver.description: The name of the ODBC driver installed on your system for MS SQL Server.

trust_server_certificate.title: Trust Server Certificate
trust_server_certificate.description: Set to true to trust the server certificate automatically (e.g., for self-signed certificates).

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query against the connected database.

tools.name: list_databases
tools.description: Lists all databases on the SQL server instance.

tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the current/specified database.

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Gets the schema (columns, types) for a specified table.
